meanings.sent1: The old house was stuccoed with a smooth, white finish.
meanings.sent2: The builders stuccoed the exterior walls to give them a textured look.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids stuccoed the tree trunk with mud for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter stuccoed the room with joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The artist stuccoed the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: The stuccoed walls of the house looked elegant and well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: The newly stuccoed building stood out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The stuccoed statue in the park seemed to blend in with the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her stuccoed shoes left a trail of marks on the freshly cleaned floor.
meanings.sent5: The stuccoed surface felt rough to the touch, but it added character to the structure.
